name: MemoRaven
0:
”Alexa, hello raven”
”What is my message”
”talk to me”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hello raven
Developer Terms of Use
des: Memo Raven allows you to create custom memos and messages from a mobile application, which can be spoken from an Echo device or the Alexa app. Set daily kid schedules, give dinner instructions, say good morning...do it all with Memo Raven
